TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ThreadExceptionEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks A發生未處理的例外狀況時，由一個執行緒。A is created by a thread when an unhandled exception occurs. 包含發生。 contains the that occurred. ## Examples 下列範例可讓您提高事件依序按一下`button1`表單上。The following example allows you to raise a event by clicking `button1` on a form. 此範例會建立兩個類別。The example creates two classes. `ErrorHandler`類別建立表單和引發事件的按鈕。The `ErrorHandler` class creates the form and the button that raises the event. `CustomExceptionHandler`類別提供方法來處理例外狀況。The `CustomExceptionHandler` class provides the methods to handle the exception. 在 `Main`中`ErrorHandler`類別，程式碼會建立例外狀況處理的類別，也就是執行個體的新執行個體`CustomExceptionHandler`。In `Main` in the `ErrorHandler` class, the code creates a new instance of the exception handling class, that is, an instance of the `CustomExceptionHandler`. 事件，然後加入執行個體，並執行應用程式。Then the instance is added to the event, and the application is run. 在 `OnThreadException`方法中的`CustomExceptionHandler`類別，此範例會使用`try...catch...finally`陳述式來處理例外狀況。In the `OnThreadException` method in the `CustomExceptionHandler` class, the example uses a `try...catch...finally` statement to process the exception. `ShowThreadExceptionDialog`方法會建立訊息，若要顯示，並將它顯示在訊息方塊。The `ShowThreadExceptionDialog` method creates the message to display, and displays it in a message box. [!code-csharp[Classic ThreadExceptionEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ThreadExceptionEventArgs Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ThreadExceptionEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ThreadExceptionEventArgs Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。
